attributes.action: Provide Trained Mentors for All Schoolchildren
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To turn into healthy adults children need a great deal of the right kind of guidance, support and encouragement.  Currently, too many children are not getting this needed support.  The answer lies in providing every child with a mentor.  Mentors should be mature, experienced people who have been fully trained for the job.
